attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.
Length of feature in internal units.

descript.abstract: This dataset adds housing density class (DEN4) and wildfire hazard (FHSZ) attributes to WUI12_2 - FRAPâ€™s preliminary result in an effort to capture Wildland Urban Interface (WUI) for the 2015 Assessment. The current dataset is appropriate for displaying the overall pattern of WUI development at the county level, and comparing counties in terms of development patternsWildfire Influence Zone - wildfire susceptible vegetation up to 1.5 miles from Wildland Urban Interface or Wildland Urban Intermix

idinfo.datacred: California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection, Fire and Resource Assessment Program (FRAP), CBI
